subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The All-Star forward LaMarcus Aldridge of Portland scored 43 and 46 points on the road to set Houston back, 2-0, in a first-round Western Conference series.
snippet: The All-Star forward LaMarcus Aldridge of Portland scored 43 and 46 points on the road to set Houston back, 2-0, in a first-round Western Conference series.
